code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CreateComment=_ref=>{let{videoId}=_ref;const[content,setContent]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('https://take-home-assessment-423502.uc.r.appspot.com/api/videos/comments',{video_id:videoId,user_id:'123',content});console.log('Comment created:',response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error creating comment:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Comment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:content,onChange:e=>setContent(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Comment"})]});};export default CreateComment;
